summary: Change gold coin into VND (the currency of VietNam)
descriptionHtml:
Mod: Change gold coin into VND 

Description:
:) I get bored when collect coins in the dark, so I decided to make it brighter, then I change it into VND coin.

Install:
Extract the file into Skyrim folder, that\'s all.

Credit:
- Bethesda
- svaalbard (give me an idea of shining coin)
________________________________________________________________________________
:) Thay dong tien gold trong game thành tien xu 5k. Vi` xu 1k nho qua\' va` không thong dung bang 5k nên xai 5k sướng hơn, hehe

--UnrealRogue--
forum Gamevn.com
author: Unrealrogue
